blocks.name: cseq
blocks.content: Extend class notation with recursive sequence builder.
blocks.origin: prop class cseq(class c0, class c1, class c2) { seq(c0(c1, c2)) }

blocks.name: diff.cseq.s
diff.cseq.c
diff.cseq.w
df-seq
blocks.content: Define a general-purpose operation that builds a recursive sequence (i.e., a function on an upper integer set such as ` NN ` or ` NN0 ` ) whose value at an index is a function of its previous value and the value of an input sequence at that index. This definition is complicated, but fortunately it is not intended to be used directly. Instead, the only purpose of this definition is to provide us with an object that has the properties expressed by ~ seq1 and ~ seqp1 . Typically, those are the main theorems that would be used in practice. The first operand in the parentheses is the operation that is applied to the previous value and the value of the input sequence (second operand). The operand to the left of the parenthesis is the integer to start from. For example, for the operation ` + ` , an input sequence ` F ` with values 1, 1/2, 1/4, 1/8,... would be transformed into the output sequence ` seq 1 ( + , F ) ` with values 1, 3/2, 7/4, 15/8,.., so that ` ( seq 1 ( + , F ) `` 1 ) = 1 ` , ` ( seq 1 ( + , F ) `` 2 ) = ` 3/2, etc. In other words, ` seq M ( + , F ) ` transforms a sequence ` F ` into an infinite series. ` seq M ( + , F ) ~~> 2 ` means "the sum of F(n) from n = M to infinity is 2." Since limits are unique ( ~ climuni ), by ~ climdm the "sum of F(n) from n = 1 to infinity" can be expressed as ` ( ~~> `` seq 1 ( + , F ) ) ` (provided the sequence converges) and evaluates to 2 in this example. Internally, the ` rec ` function generates as its values a set of ordered pairs starting at ` <. M , ( F `` M ) >. ` , with the first member of each pair incremented by one in each successive value. So, the range of ` rec ` is exactly the sequence we want, and we just extract the range (restricted to omega) and throw away the domain. This definition has its roots in a series of theorems from ~ om2uz0i through ~ om2uzf1oi , originally proved by Raph Levien for use with ~ df-exp and later generalized for arbitrary recursive sequences. Definition ~ df-sum extracts the summation values from partial (finite) and complete (infinite) series. (Contributed by NM, 18-Apr-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-seq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cima(crdg(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(s1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), com))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-seq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ seq(c0(c1, c2))=(rec((s0 ∈ 𝕌, s1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(s0[+]1),(s1[c1](c2 `(s0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>)" _om)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
}

blocks.content: Existence of the sequence builder operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqex(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(cseq(c0, c1, c2), universe)
} = {
  eqeltri(cseq(c0, c1, c2), universe, cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), com))
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  mp2an(wcel(cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), com), universe), wfun(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)))), wcel(com, universe))
  rdgfun(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)))
  omex()
  funimaexg(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), com, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm seqex(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ seq(c0(c1, c2))∈ 𝕌
} = {
  eqeltri(seq(c0(c1, c2)), universe, (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>)" _om))
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  mp2an((rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>)" _om)∈ 𝕌, Fun(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>)), _om ∈ 𝕌)
  rdgfun((hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>)
  omex()
  funimaexg(rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>), com, universe)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

thm seqeq1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cseq(c0, c2, c3), cseq(c1, c2, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cseq(c0, c2, c3), cseq(c1, c2, c3), cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c3, c0))), com), cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c1, cfv(c3, c1))), com), wceq(c0, c1))
  imaeq1d(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c3, c0))), com, crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c1, cfv(c3, c1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c3, c0))), crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c1, cfv(c3, c1)))), wceq(cop(c0, cfv(c3, c0)), cop(c1, cfv(c3, c1))))
  mpdan(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cop(c0, cfv(c3, c0)), cop(c1, cfv(c3, c1))), wceq(cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c3, c1)))
  fveq2(c0, c1, c3)
  opeq12(c0, c1, cfv(c3, c0), cfv(c3, c1))
  rdgeq2(cop(c0, cfv(c3, c0)), cop(c1, cfv(c3, c1)), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c2, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))))
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c0, c2, c3)
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm seqeq2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cseq(c2, c0, c3), cseq(c2, c1, c3)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cseq(c2, c0, c3), cseq(c2, c1, c3), cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c3, c2))), com), cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c3, c2))), com), wceq(c0, c1))
  imaeq1d(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c3, c2))), com, crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c3, c2))), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c3, c2))), crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c3, c2)))), wceq(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))))))
  mpt2eq3dv(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  opeq2d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  oveq(c0, c1, cv(hs1), cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  rdgeq1(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c0, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c3, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c3, c2)))
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c2, c0, c3)
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c2, c1, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm seqeq3(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cseq(c2, c3, c0), cseq(c2, c3, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cseq(c2, c3, c0), cseq(c2, c3, c1), cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))), com), cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2))), com), wceq(c0, c1))
  imaeq1d(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))), com, crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2))), wceq(c0, c1))
  syl2anc(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2))), crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))), wceq(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))))), wceq(cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2))))
  mpt2eq3dv(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))), wceq(c0, c1))
  opeq2d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))), wceq(c0, c1))
  oveq2d(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  fveq1(c0, c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  opeq2d(c2, cfv(c0, c2), cfv(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c1))
  fveq1(c0, c1, c2)
  rdgeq12(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c3, cfv(c1, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c2, cfv(c0, c2)), cop(c2, cfv(c1, c2)))
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c0)
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c2, c3, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs1.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm nfseq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cseq(c0, c1, c2))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cseq(c0, c1, c2), cima(crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), com))
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfima(s0, crdg(cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0))), com)
  nfrdg(s0, cmpo(hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))), cop(c0, cfv(c2, c0)))
  nfmpt2(s0, hs0, hs1, universe, universe, cop(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))))
  nfcv(s0, universe)
  nfop(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))))
  nfov(s0, cv(hs1), c1, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)))
  nfcv(s0, cv(hs1))
  nffv(s0, c2, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  nfcv(s0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1))
  nfop(s0, c0, cfv(c2, c0))
  nffv(s0, c2, c0)
  nfcv(s0, com)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.com.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfseq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, seq(c0(c1, c2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c2)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, seq(c0(c1, c2)), (rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>)" _om))
  df-seq(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2)
  nfima(s0, rec((hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>), com)
  nfrdg(s0, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌, hs1 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>), < c0,(c2 ` c0)>)
  nfmpt2(s0, hs0, hs1, universe, universe, <(hs0[+]1),(hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1)))>)
  nfcv(s0, universe)
  nfop(s0, (hs0[+]1), (hs1[c1](c2 `(hs0[+]1))))
  nfov(s0, hs1, c1, (c2 `(hs0[+]1)))
  nfcv(s0, hs1)
  nffv(s0, c2, (hs0[+]1))
  nfcv(s0, (hs0[+]1))
  nfop(s0, c0, (c2 ` c0))
  nffv(s0, c2, c0)
  nfcv(s0, com)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

thm seqcl2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c3)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzfz2(c3, c0)
  mpcom(w0, wi(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  uzind4(s0, hs0, c3, c0, wi(w0, wi(wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c4))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), c4))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), c4))), wi(w0, wi(wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat1)), c4))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), w0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c4)), wi(wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), c4)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c4), wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), c4))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c0, co(c0, cfz, c3))
  eleq1d(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(s0)), c4, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))

blocks.name: seqf2
blocks.content: Range of the recursive sequence builder. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)

thm seqf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cuz, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wf(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), wf(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0), c4))
  sylanbrc(w0, wf(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0), c4), wfn(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0)), wral(hs0, cfv(cuz, c0), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), c4)))
  syl(w0, wfn(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  seqfn(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(hs0, cfv(cuz, c0), w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), c4))
  seqcl2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c4, c5, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cfv(c2, c0), c4))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), co(c0, caddc, nat1), cv(hs0))
  ffnfv(hs0, cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0), c4)
  feq2i(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4, cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm seqf2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2)): c3 → c4))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c2 ` c0)∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)))→(c2 ` s0)∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, (seq(c0(c1, c2)): c3 → c4), (seq(c0(c1, c2)):(ℤ≥ ` c0)→ c4))
  sylanbrc(w0, (seq(c0(c1, c2)):(ℤ≥ ` c0)→ c4), seq(c0(c1, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c0), ∀(hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0),(seq(c0(c1, c2))` hs0)∈ c4))
  syl(w0, seq(c0(c1, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  seqfn(c0, c1, c2)
  ralrimiva(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0, (seq(c0(c1, c2))` hs0)∈ c4)
  seqcl2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, hs0, c4, c5, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (c2 ` c0)∈ c4)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), (s0[c1]s1)∈ c4)
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), s0 ∈((c0[+]1)[...]hs0), (c2 ` s0)∈ c5)
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈((c0[+]1)[...]hs0), (c2 ` s0)∈ c5, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)))
  elfzuz(s0, (c0[+]1), hs0)
  ffnfv(hs0, seq(c0(c1, c2)), (ℤ≥ ` c0), c4)
  feq2i(seq(c0(c1, c2)), c3, c4, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c0(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: seqcl
blocks.content: Closure properties of the recursive sequence builder. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

thm seqf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

thm seqf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2)): c3 → c4))
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c3)→(c2 ` s0)∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4))→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  seqf2(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c4, w0)
  rspcdva(s0, c0, c3, w0, (c2 ` c0)∈ c4, (c2 ` s0)∈ c4)
  eleq1d((c2 ` s0), c4, (c2 ` c0), s0 = c0)
  fveq2(s0, c0, c2)
  ralrimiva(s0, c3, w0, (c2 ` s0)∈ c4)
  syl6eleqr(c0, c3, (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  uzid(c0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), (c2 ` s0)∈ c4, s0 ∈ c3)
  syl6eleqr(s0, c3, (ℤ≥ ` c0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1))))
  sylan(w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c0[+]1)), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  peano2uzr(c0, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c2 ` c0), c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c0)
}

  eluzp1p1(cv(hs1), c4)
  ad2antll(w0, wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cuz, c4)), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(c4, cfz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))
  elfzuz3(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c4, c3)
  elfzuzb(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(c4, caddc, nat1), c3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wi(wcel(c3, co(c4, cfz, c3)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(cseq(c4, c1, c5), c3)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wi(wcel(c4, co(c4, cfz, c3)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c4), cfv(cseq(c4, c1, c5), c4)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs1), co(c4, cfz, c3)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs1)), cfv(cseq(c4, c1, c5), cv(hs1))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wi(w0, wi(wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), co(c4, cfz, c3)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cfv(cseq(c4, c1, c5), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wi(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c4, cfz, c3)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), cfv(cseq(c4, c1, c5), cv(hs0))))))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c4, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c4, caddc, nat1)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c2, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), cfv(c5, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c5, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Equality of sequences. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)

thm seqfeq2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)), cseq(c3, c1, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c4, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(hs0, cres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)), cseq(c3, c1, c4), cfv(cuz, c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wfn(cres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)), cfv(cuz, c3)), wfn(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0)), wss(cfv(cuz, c3), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  3syl(w0, wfn(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  eluzel2(c3, c0)
  seqfn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wss(cfv(cuz, c3), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  uzss(c3, c0)
  fnssres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0), cfv(cuz, c3))
  3syl(w0, wfn(cseq(c3, c1, c4), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c3, cz))
  eluzelz(c3, c0)
  seqfn(c3, c1, c4)
  eqtrd(cfv(cres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cseq(c3, c1, c4), cv(hs0)), cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3))))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wceq(cfv(cres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)), cv(hs0)), cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cv(hs0))))
  fvres(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3), cseq(c0, c1, c2))
  seqfveq2(s0, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c4, c3)))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3)), wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c3, caddc, nat1), cfz, cv(hs0))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1))))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), co(c3, caddc, nat1), cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c3, c1, c4))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c3)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm seqfeq2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2))|`(ℤ≥ ` c3))= seq(c3(c1, c4)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)=(c4 ` c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))→(c2 ` s0)=(c4 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(hs0, (seq(c0(c1, c2))|`(ℤ≥ ` c3)), seq(c3(c1, c4)), (ℤ≥ ` c3), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (seq(c0(c1, c2))|`(ℤ≥ ` c3))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c3), seq(c0(c1, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c0), (ℤ≥ ` c3)⊆(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  3syl(w0, seq(c0(c1, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  eluzel2(c3, c0)
  seqfn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl(w0, (ℤ≥ ` c3)⊆(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  uzss(c3, c0)
  fnssres(seq(c0(c1, c2)), (ℤ≥ ` c0), (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  3syl(w0, seq(c3(c1, c4))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c3), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c3 ∈ ℤ)
  eluzelz(c3, c0)
  seqfn(c3, c1, c4)
  eqtrd(((seq(c0(c1, c2))|`(ℤ≥ ` c3))` hs0), (seq(c3(c1, c4))` hs0), (seq(c0(c1, c2))` hs0), (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3)))
  adantl(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), ((seq(c0(c1, c2))|`(ℤ≥ ` c3))` hs0)=(seq(c0(c1, c2))` hs0))
  fvres(hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c3), seq(c0(c1, c2)))
  seqfveq2(s0, c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3, c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), (seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)=(c4 ` c3))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3), s0 ∈((c3[+]1)[...]hs0), (c2 ` s0)=(c4 ` s0))
  sylan2(w0, s0 ∈((c3[+]1)[...]hs0), (c2 ` s0)=(c4 ` s0), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ `(c3[+]1)))
  elfzuz(s0, (c3[+]1), hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((seq(c0(c1, c2))|`(ℤ≥ ` c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c3(c1, c4)))
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ ` c3))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c3)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
}

thm seqfveq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c4), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqfveq2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c0, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  uzid(c0)
  eqtrd(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), cfv(c4, c0), cfv(c2, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), cfv(c2, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  seq1(c0, c1, c2)
  rspcdva(s0, c0, co(c0, cfz, c3), w0, wceq(cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  eqeq12d(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c4, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, c2)
  fveq2(cv(s0), c0, c4)
  ralrimiva(s0, co(c0, cfz, c3), w0, wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0))))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzfz1(c3, c0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c4, cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3), co(c0, cfz, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(co(co(c0, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzel2(c3, c0)
  fzp1ss(c0, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cfv(c2, c0), cfv(c4, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, c0)
}

thm seqfveq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)=(seq(c0(c1, c4))` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c3))→(c2 ` s0)=(c4 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqfveq2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c0, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  uzid(c0)
  eqtrd((seq(c0(c1, c2))` c0), (c4 ` c0), (c2 ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, (seq(c0(c1, c2))` c0)=(c2 ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  seq1(c0, c1, c2)
  rspcdva(s0, c0, (c0[...]c3), w0, (c2 ` c0)=(c4 ` c0), (c2 ` s0)=(c4 ` s0))
  eqeq12d((c2 ` s0), (c4 ` s0), (c2 ` c0), (c4 ` c0), s0 = c0)
  fveq2(s0, c0, c2)
  fveq2(s0, c0, c4)
  ralrimiva(s0, (c0[...]c3), w0, (c2 ` s0)=(c4 ` s0))
  syl(w0, c0 ∈(c0[...]c3), c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  eluzfz1(c3, c0)
  syldan(w0, s0 ∈((c0[+]1)[...]c3), (c2 ` s0)=(c4 ` s0), s0 ∈(c0[...]c3))
  sselda(s0, ((c0[+]1)[...]c3), (c0[...]c3), w0)
  syl(w0, ((c0[+]1)[...]c3)⊆(c0[...]c3), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  syl(w0, c0 ∈ ℤ, c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  eluzel2(c3, c0)
  fzp1ss(c0, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cfz, c3)
  diff.cfz.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c2 ` c0), (c4 ` c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c2, c0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c4, c0)

blocks.content: Shifting the index set of a sequence. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)

thm seqshft2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, c4), c1, c5), co(c3, caddc, c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cfv(c5, co(cv(s0), caddc, c4))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpd(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, c4), c1, c5), co(c3, caddc, c4))), wcel(c3, co(c0, cfz, c3)))

blocks.name: seqsplit
blocks.content: Split a sequence into two sequences. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)

blocks.name: seq1p
blocks.content: Removing the first term from a sequence. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seq1p(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s2), c4))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqtrd(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(cfv(c2, c0), c1, cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3)), co(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), c1, cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3)), w0)
  seqsplit(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c0, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  uzid(c0)
  oveq1d(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), c1, cfv(cseq(co(c0, caddc, nat1), c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c0), cfv(c2, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  seq1(c0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: seqcaopr2
blocks.content: The sum of two infinite series (generalized to an arbitrary commutative and associative operation). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2014.)

thm seqcaopr2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {

  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7)), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c7), wcel(cv(s3), c7)))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s3))), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c5, co(cv(s2), c1, cv(s3)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c4), c3), c5, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c6), c3)))), diffss(s2, s4))

  sylan(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfzo, c3))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c7), wral(s4, co(c0, cfz, c3), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s4)), c7)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(c0, cfzo, c3)), wral(s4, co(c0, cfz, c3), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s4)), c7)))

blocks.name: seqcaopr
blocks.content: The sum of two infinite series (generalized to an arbitrary commutative and associative operation). (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2014.)

  syl12anc(wa(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c6), wcel(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), c6), wcel(cv(hs3), c6)))), wcel(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs3)), c6), w0, wcel(cv(hs1), c6), wcel(cv(hs3), c6))

blocks.pretty:
thm seqcaopr(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)=((seq(c0(c1, c4))` c3)[c1](seq(c0(c1, c5))` c3)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c6 ∧ s1 ∈ c6))→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c6 ∧ s1 ∈ c6))→(s0[c1]s1)=(s1[c1]s0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c6 ∧ s1 ∈ c6 ∧ s2 ∈ c6))→((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s3 ∈(c0[...]c3))→(c4 ` s3)∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s3 ∈(c0[...]c3))→(c5 ` s3)∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s3 ∈(c0[...]c3))→(c2 ` s3)=((c4 ` s3)[c1](c5 ` s3)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)

blocks.content: Rearrange a sum via an arbitrary bijection on ` ( M ... N ) ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)

blocks.name: seradd
blocks.content: The sum of two infinite series. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seradd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2), caddc, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), caddc, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqcaopr(hs0, hs1, hs2, s0, c0, caddc, c1, c2, c3, c4, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs0))))
  addcom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), caddc, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2)))))
  addass(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

thm seradd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)=((seq(c0(+, c3))` c2)[+](seq(c0(+, c4))` c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c3 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c4 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c1 ` s0)=((c3 ` s0)[+](c4 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqcaopr(hs0, hs1, hs2, s0, c0, caddc, c1, c2, c3, c4, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ), (hs0[+]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  addcl(hs0, hs1)
  adantl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ), (hs0[+]hs1)=(hs1[+]hs0))
  addcom(hs0, hs1)
  adantl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs2 ∈ ℂ), ((hs0[+]hs1)[+]hs2)=(hs0[+](hs1[+]hs2)))
  addass(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: sersub
blocks.content: The difference of two infinite series. (Contributed by NM, 17-Mar-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm sersub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c4), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c4, cv(s0)), cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wceq(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c4, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqcaopr2(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, s0, c0, caddc, c1, c2, c3, cmin, c4, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cc))
  addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs1)), cc))
  subcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cc), wcel(cv(hs3), cc))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs2)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs3))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cmin, co(cv(hs2), caddc, cv(hs3)))))
  eqcomd(co(co(cv(hs0), cmin, cv(hs2)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmin, cv(hs3))), co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cmin, co(cv(hs2), caddc, cv(hs3))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc)), wa(wcel(cv(hs2), cc), wcel(cv(hs3), cc))))
  addsub4(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs3))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cmin)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(cmin)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(caddc)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(cmin)
  diff.hs3.c(c4)
  diff.hs3.c(cc)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.w(w0)
}

thm sersub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)=((seq(c0(+, c3))` c2)[-](seq(c0(+, c4))` c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c3 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c4 ` s0)∈ ℂ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c1 ` s0)=((c3 ` s0)[-](c4 ` s0)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqcaopr2(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3, s0, c0, caddc, c1, c2, c3, cmin, c4, cc, w0)
  adantl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ), (hs0[+]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  addcl(hs0, hs1)
  adantl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ), (hs0[-]hs1)∈ ℂ)
  subcl(hs0, hs1)
  adantl(w0, ((hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs2 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℂ)), ((hs0[-]hs2)[+](hs1[-]hs3))=((hs0[+]hs1)[-](hs2[+]hs3)))
  eqcomd(((hs0[-]hs2)[+](hs1[-]hs3)), ((hs0[+]hs1)[-](hs2[+]hs3)), ((hs0 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℂ)∧(hs2 ∈ ℂ ∧ hs3 ∈ ℂ)))
  addsub4(hs0, hs1, hs2, hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cmin)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(cmin)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c3)
  diff.hs2.c(cmin)
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(caddc)
  diff.hs3.c(c3)
  diff.hs3.c(cmin)
  diff.hs3.c(c4)
  diff.hs3.c(cc)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)

  diff.hs3.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: seqid3
blocks.content: A sequence that consists entirely of "zeroes" sums to "zero". More precisely, a constant sequence with value an element which is a ` .+ ` -idempotent sums (or " ` .+ ` 's") to that element. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqid3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(co(c4, c1, c4), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), csn(c4)))
  seqcl(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, csn(c4), w0)
  sylibr(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), csn(c4)), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4))
  elsn(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4)
  fvex(c2, cv(s0))
  imp(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c4))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), csn(c4)))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c4))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), csn(c4)), wcel(co(c4, c1, c4), csn(c4)))
  sylibr(w0, wcel(co(c4, c1, c4), csn(c4)), wceq(co(c4, c1, c4), c4))
  elsn(co(c4, c1, c4), c4)
  ovex(c4, c1, c4)
  eleq1d(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), csn(c4), co(c4, c1, c4), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c4))))
  oveqan12d(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0), c4, c4, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c4)), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c4)))
  elsni(cv(s0), c4)
  elsni(cv(hs0), c4)
  elsni(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), c4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c4))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

thm seqid3(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)= c4)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c4[c1]c4)= c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c3))→(c2 ` s0)= c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl(w0, (seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)= c4, (seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)∈ { c4 })
  seqcl(s0, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, { c4 }, w0)
  sylibr((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c3)), (c2 ` s0)∈ { c4 }, (c2 ` s0)= c4)
  elsn((c2 ` s0), c4)
  fvex(c2, s0)
  imp(w0, (s0 ∈ { c4 } ∧ hs0 ∈ { c4 }), (s0[c1]hs0)∈ { c4 })
  syl5ibrcom(w0, (s0 ∈ { c4 } ∧ hs0 ∈ { c4 }), (s0[c1]hs0)∈ { c4 }, (c4[c1]c4)∈ { c4 })
  sylibr(w0, (c4[c1]c4)∈ { c4 }, (c4[c1]c4)= c4)
  elsn((c4[c1]c4), c4)
  ovex(c4, c1, c4)
  eleq1d((s0[c1]hs0), { c4 }, (c4[c1]c4), (s0 ∈ { c4 } ∧ hs0 ∈ { c4 }))
  oveqan12d(s0, c1, hs0, c4, c4, s0 ∈ { c4 }, hs0 ∈ { c4 })
  elsni(s0, c4)
  elsni(hs0, c4)
  elsni((seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3), c4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c4 })
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: seqid
blocks.content: Discarding the first few terms of a sequence that starts with all zeroes (or any element which is a left-identity for ` .+ ` ) has no effect on its sum. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqid(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cres(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c3)), cseq(c3, c1, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1)))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  seqfeq2(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, w0)
  mpjaod(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c3)), wceq(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  syl5ibcom(w0, wceq(c3, c0), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cseq(c3, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c3)))
  3syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c3, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c3)), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c3, cz))
  eluzelz(c3, c0)
  seq1(c3, c1, c2)
  eqeq1d(cfv(cseq(c3, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), wceq(c3, c0))
  fveq1d(cseq(c3, c1, c2), c3, cseq(c0, c1, c2), wceq(c3, c0))
  seqeq1(c3, c0, c1, c2)
  ex(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c3)))
  3eqtrd(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(c2, c3), co(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1, cfv(c2, c3)), co(c5, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  sylan(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1, cfv(c2, c3))), wcel(c0, cz))
  seqm1(c0, c3, c1, c2)
  oveq1d(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, cmin, nat1)), c1, cfv(c2, c3), c5, wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  seqid3(s0, c0, c1, c2, co(c3, cmin, nat1), c5, wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wceq(co(c5, c1, c5), c5))
  rspcdva(s0, c5, c4, w0, wceq(co(c5, c1, c5), c5), wceq(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  eqeq12d(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c5, c1, c5), c5, wceq(cv(s0), c5))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c5, c5, c1)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c5))
  sylan(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(co(c3, cmin, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  eluzel2(c3, c0)
  eluzp1m1(c0, c3)
  adantlr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, co(c3, cmin, nat1))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5))
  rspcdva(s0, cfv(c2, c3), c4, wa(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wceq(co(c5, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  eqeq12d(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c5, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c3)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c3), c5, c1)
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wral(s0, c4, wceq(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c4, w0, wceq(co(c5, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))), wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c4))
  syl(w0, wo(wceq(c3, c0), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))), wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  uzp1(c3, c0)
  eqidd(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, co(c3, caddc, nat1)))))
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c3, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))

  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c5, c1, c5), c5)

blocks.name: seqid2
blocks.content: The last few partial sums of a sequence that ends with all zeroes (or any element which is a right-identity for ` .+ ` ) are all the same. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)

blocks.name: seqhomo
blocks.content: Apply a homomorphism to a sequence. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqhomo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(cseq(c1, c2, c3), c4)), cfv(cseq(c1, c5, c6), c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, c4))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(cuz, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))), wceq(cfv(c0, co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))), co(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), c5, cfv(c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cfz, c4))), wceq(cfv(c0, cfv(c3, cv(s0))), cfv(c6, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)

blocks.name: seqz
blocks.content: If the operation ` .+ ` has an absorbing element ` Z ` (a.k.a. zero element), then any sequence containing a ` Z ` evaluates to ` Z ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)

  rspcdva(s0, cv(s1), c5, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c4)), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(c4, c1, cv(s1)), c4), wceq(co(c4, c1, cv(s0)), c4))
  eqeq1d(co(c4, c1, cv(s0)), c4, co(c4, c1, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(s1), c4, c1)
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c4)), wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wral(s0, c5, wceq(co(c4, c1, cv(s0)), c4)))
  ralrimiva(s0, c5, w0, wceq(co(c4, c1, cv(s0)), c4))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c4)), wcel(cv(s1), c5))
  elsn(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4)
  ovex(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c6)), wcel(c6, co(c0, cfz, c3)))
  elfzuz3(c6, c0, c3)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(co(c6, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(co(c6, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3), co(c0, cfz, c3), w0)
  syl(w0, wss(co(co(c6, caddc, nat1), cfz, c3), co(c0, cfz, c3)), wcel(co(c6, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(co(c6, caddc, nat1), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c6, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c6, co(c0, cfz, c3)))
  elfzuz(c6, c0, c3)
  peano2uz(c6, c0)
  fzss1(co(c6, caddc, nat1), c0, c3)

  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), co(c6, cmin, nat1)), c1, c4)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cseq(c0, c1, c2), co(c6, cmin, nat1))
  diff.cseq.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c6, cmin, nat1)
  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(c6, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c6, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, caddc, nat1)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(c6, cfv(cuz, co(c0, caddc, nat1))))

}

blocks.name: seqfeq4
blocks.content: Equality of series under different addition operations which agree on an additively closed subset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqfeq4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(cseq(c0, c4, c2), c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqr(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), cfv(cseq(c0, c4, c2), c3), cfv(cid, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3)), w0)
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cid, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3)), cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3)), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), universe))
  fvex(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3)
  fvi(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), universe)
  seqhomo(s0, s1, cid, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  3eqtr4g(cfv(cid, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cid, cv(s0)), c4, cfv(cid, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))))
  ax-mp(wceq(cfv(cid, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), universe))
  ovex(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  fvi(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), universe)
  oveq12i(cfv(cid, cv(s0)), c4, cfv(cid, cv(s1)), cv(s0), cv(s1))
  elv(s0, wceq(cfv(cid, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  fvi(cv(s0), universe)
  elv(s1, wceq(cfv(cid, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  fvi(cv(s1), universe)
  mp1i(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wceq(cfv(cid, cfv(c2, cv(s0))), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe))
  fvex(c2, cv(s0))
  fvi(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), universe)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cid.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm seqfeq4(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)=(seq(c0(c4, c2))` c3))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c3))→(c2 ` s0)∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))→(s0[c1]s1)=(s0[c4]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqr((seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3), (seq(c0(c4, c2))` c3), (= `(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)), w0)
  ax-mp((= `(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3))=(seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3), (seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3)∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(seq(c0(c1, c2)), c3)
  fvi((seq(c0(c1, c2))` c3), universe)
  seqhomo(s0, s1, cid, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c2, c5, w0)
  3eqtr4g((= `(s0[c1]s1)), ((= ` s0)[c4](= ` s1)), (s0[c1]s1), (s0[c4]s1), (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5)))
  ax-mp((= `(s0[c1]s1))=(s0[c1]s1), (s0[c1]s1)∈ 𝕌)
  ovex(s0, c1, s1)
  fvi((s0[c1]s1), universe)
  oveq12i((= ` s0), c4, (= ` s1), s0, s1)
  elv(s0, (= ` s0)= s0)
  fvi(s0, universe)
  elv(s1, (= ` s1)= s1)
  fvi(s1, universe)
  mp1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c3)), (= `(c2 ` s0))=(c2 ` s0), (c2 ` s0)∈ 𝕌)
  fvex(c2, s0)
  fvi((c2 ` s0), universe)
  diff.cid.s(s0)
  diff.cid.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: seqfeq3
blocks.content: Equality of series under different addition operations which agree on an additively closed subset. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqfeq3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cseq(c0, c3, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cz))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(hs0, cseq(c0, c1, c2), cseq(c0, c3, c2), cfv(cuz, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wfn(cseq(c0, c1, c2), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  seqfn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl(w0, wfn(cseq(c0, c3, c2), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(c0, cz))
  seqfn(c0, c3, c2)
  seqfeq4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c3, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0)))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), c4), w0, wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  simpll(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))))
  adantl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  elfzuz(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4))
  adantlr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cseq(c0, c3, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), cfv(cuz, c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm seqfeq3(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → seq(c0(c1, c2))= seq(c0(c3, c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))→(c2 ` s0)∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4))→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4))→(s0[c1]s1)=(s0[c3]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqfnfvd(hs0, seq(c0(c1, c2)), seq(c0(c3, c2)), (ℤ≥ ` c0), w0)
  syl(w0, seq(c0(c1, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  seqfn(c0, c1, c2)
  syl(w0, seq(c0(c3, c2))[Fn](ℤ≥ ` c0), c0 ∈ ℤ)
  seqfn(c0, c3, c2)
  seqfeq4(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, hs0, c3, c4, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)))
  simpr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  syl2anc(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0)), (c2 ` s0)∈ c4, w0, s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  simpll(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0))
  adantl((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0)), s0 ∈(c0[...]hs0), s0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  elfzuz(s0, c0, hs0)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4), (s0[c1]s1)∈ c4)
  adantlr(w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0), (s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4), (s0[c1]s1)=(s0[c3]s1))
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c0(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(seq(c0(c3, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c((ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, hs0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, (ℤ≥ ` c0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cuz, c0)
  diff.cuz.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: seqdistr
blocks.content: The distributive property for series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm seqdistr(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(c4, c5, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c6), c3))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))), wceq(co(c4, c5, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), co(co(c4, c5, cv(s0)), c1, co(c4, c5, cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wcel(cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c3))), wceq(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), co(c4, c5, cfv(c6, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s0, c7)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c7)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c2), c3), co(c4, c5, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c6), c3)), cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c6), c3)), w0)
  seqhomo(s0, s1, cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), c0, c1, c6, c3, c1, c2, c7, w0)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), co(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), c1, cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), cv(s1))), co(c4, c5, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), co(co(c4, c5, cv(s0)), c1, co(c4, c5, cv(s1))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))))
  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), co(c4, c5, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c7))
  fvmpt(hs0, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c7, cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), co(c4, c5, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))), co(c4, c5, cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c4, c5)
  ovex(c4, c5, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)))
  oveq12d(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), c1, cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), cv(s1)), co(c4, c5, cv(s0)), co(c4, c5, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7))))
  ad2antrl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c7), wcel(cv(s1), c7), wceq(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), cv(s0)), co(c4, c5, cv(s0))))
  fvmpt(hs0, cv(s0), c7, cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), co(c4, c5, cv(s0)), co(c4, c5, cv(hs0)))
  oveq2(cv(hs0), cv(s0), c4, c5)
  ovex(c4, c5, cv(s0))

  fvmpt(hs0, cfv(c6, cv(s0)), c7, cmpt(hs0, c7, co(c4, c5, cv(hs0))), co(c4, c5, cfv(c6, cv(s0))), co(c4, c5, cv(hs0)))

blocks.name: ser0
blocks.content: The value of the partial sums in a zero-valued infinite series. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2014.)

thm ser0(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(cseq(c2, caddc, cxp(c1, csn(nat0))), c0), nat0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
} = {
  seqid3(hs0, c2, caddc, cxp(c1, csn(nat0)), c0, nat0, wcel(c0, c1))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, nat0), nat0))
  00id()
  biimpi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, c2)))
  eleq2i(c0, c1, cfv(cuz, c2))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfz, c0))), wceq(cfv(cxp(c1, csn(nat0)), cv(hs0)), nat0), wcel(nat0, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  0cn()
  adantl(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfz, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl6eleqr(cv(hs0), c1, cfv(cuz, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, cfz, c0)))
  elfzuz(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  fvconst2g(nat0, cc, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, csn(nat0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
}

thm serge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

thm serge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → 0[≤](seq(c0(+, c1))` c2))

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ)

  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  syl(w0, 0[≤](seq(c0(+, c1))` c2), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)∈ { hs0 ∈ ℝ | 0[≤]hs0 })

  syl2anb(s0 ∈ { hs0 ∈ ℝ | 0[≤]hs0 }, hs1 ∈ { hs0 ∈ ℝ | 0[≤]hs0 }, (s0[+]hs1)∈ { hs0 ∈ ℝ | 0[≤]hs0 }, (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[≤]s0), (hs1 ∈ ℝ ∧ 0[≤]hs1))
  elrab(hs0, s0, cr, 0[≤]hs0, 0[≤]s0)
  breq2(hs0, s0, nat0, cle)

blocks.name: serle
blocks.content: Comparison of partial sums of two infinite series of reals. (Contributed by NM, 27-Dec-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm serle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wcel(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wbr(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2), cle, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2))))
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, co(cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c3), c2), cmin, cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, c1), c2)), cfv(cseq(c0, caddc, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), c2), w0)
  serge0(s0, c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), c2, w0)
  syl5eqel(cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), cr, co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  resubcld(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  syl6breqr(nat0, cle, cfv(cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), cv(s0)), co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  mpbird(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))), wbr(nat0, cle, co(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))), wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c3, cv(s0))))
  subge0d(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  sersub(s0, c0, cmpt(hs0, universe, co(cfv(c3, cv(hs0)), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(hs0)))), c2, c3, c1, w0)
  recnd(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))
  recnd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cfz, c2))))

thm serle(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)[≤](seq(c0(+, c3))` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(ℤ≥ ` c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c1 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c3 ` s0)∈ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2))→(c1 ` s0)[≤](c3 ` s0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, (seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)[≤](seq(c0(+, c3))` c2), 0[≤]((seq(c0(+, c3))` c2)[-](seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)))
  breqtrd(nat0, cle, ((seq(c0(+, c3))` c2)[-](seq(c0(+, c1))` c2)), (seq(c0(+,(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0)))))` c2), w0)
  serge0(s0, c0, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0))), c2, w0)
  syl5eqel(((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0)))` s0), cr, ((c3 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)))
  resubcld((c3 ` s0), (c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)))
  syl6breqr(nat0, cle, ((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0)))` s0), ((c3 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0)), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)))
  mpbird((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)), 0[≤]((c3 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0)), (c1 ` s0)[≤](c3 ` s0))
  subge0d((c3 ` s0), (c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)))
  sersub(s0, c0, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0))), c2, c3, c1, w0)
  recnd((c3 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)))
  recnd((c1 ` s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)))
  a1i((w0 ∧ s0 ∈(c0[...]c2)), ((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0)))` s0)=((c3 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0)))
  elv(s0, ((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0)))` s0)=((c3 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0)))
  fvmpt(hs0, s0, universe, (hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0))), ((c3 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0)), ((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0)))
  oveq12d((c3 ` hs0), cmin, (c1 ` hs0), (c3 ` s0), (c1 ` s0), hs0 = s0)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c3)
  fveq2(hs0, s0, c1)
  eqid((hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0))))
  ovex((c3 ` s0), cmin, (c1 ` s0))
  subge0d((seq(c0(+, c3))` c2), (seq(c0(+, c1))` c2), w0)
  seqcl(s0, hs0, c0, caddc, c3, c2, cr, w0)
  seqcl(s0, hs0, c0, caddc, c1, c2, cr, w0)
  adantl(w0, (s0 ∈ ℝ ∧ hs0 ∈ ℝ), (s0[+]hs0)∈ ℝ)
  readdcl(s0, hs0)
  diff.cmpt.s(s0, hs0, universe, ((c3 ` hs0)[-](c1 ` hs0)))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s0, (c3 ` hs0), cmin, (c1 ` hs0))

  diff.cmin.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(((c3 ` s0)[-](c1 ` s0)))

thm seqof(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {

  eqtrd(cfv(cseq(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3), cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c5), c3)), cmpt(s0, c4, cfv(cfv(cseq(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3), cv(s0))), w0)

  sylib(w0, wfn(cfv(cseq(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3), c4), wcel(cfv(cseq(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3), cab(s0, wfn(cv(s0), c4))))
  seqcl(s1, hs0, c0, cof(c1), c2, c3, cab(s0, wfn(cv(s0), c4)), w0)

  eqtr3d(cfv(cfv(cseq(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3), cv(s0)), cfv(cseq(c0, c1, c5), c3), cfv(cmpt(hs1, universe, cfv(cv(hs1), cv(s0))), cfv(cseq(c0, cof(c1), c2), c3)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c4)))

blocks.name: seqof2
blocks.content: Distribute function operation through a sequence. Maps-to notation version of ~ seqof . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jul-2017.)
